TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LosFormatter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Serializes the view state for a Web Forms page. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The limited object serialization (LOS) formatter is designed for highly compact ASCII format serialization. This class supports serializing any object graph, but is optimized for those containing strings, arrays, and hash tables. It offers second order optimization for many of the .NET Framework primitive types.
This is a private format and remains consistent only for the lifetime of a Web request.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object Deserialize(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> that contains the view-state value to transform.
Docs.summary: Transforms the view-state value contained in a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This version of the Deserialize method is used to transform the view-state value contained in a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to a LOS-formatted object.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. Call this method only with trusted data. For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object Deserialize(class System.IO.TextReader input) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.IO.TextReader> that contains the view-state value to transform.
Docs.summary: Transforms the view-state value contained in a <xref:System.IO.TextReader> object to a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.LosFormatter.Deserialize%2A> method is used to transform the view-state value contained in a <xref:System.IO.TextReader> object to a LOS-formatted object.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. Call this method only with trusted data. For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object Deserialize(string input) cil managed

Docs.summary: Transforms the specified view-state value to a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.LosFormatter.Deserialize%2A> method is used to transform the specified view-state value to a LOS-formatted object.
> [!IMPORTANT] > Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. Call this method only with trusted data. For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).

MemberSignature.Value: public void Serialize (System.IO.Stream stream, object value);
.method public hidebysig instance void Serialize(class System.IO.Stream stream, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> to receive the transformed value.
The LOS-formatted object to transform into a view-state value.
Docs.summary: Transforms a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object into a view-state value and places the results into a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This version of the Serialize method is used to transform a LOS-formatted object into a view-state value. The results are then placed into a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Serialize (System.IO.TextWriter output, object value);
.method public hidebysig instance void Serialize(class System.IO.TextWriter output, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> to receive the transformed value.
The LOS-formatted object to transform into a view-state value.
Docs.summary: Transforms a limited object serialization (LOS)-formatted object into a view-state value and places the results into a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.LosFormatter.Serialize%2A> method is used to transform a LOS-formatted object into a view-state value. The results are then placed into a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object.
